text: Banzan may refer to: * 10453 Banzan, a main-belt asteroid named after Kumazawa Banzan * 30963 Mount Banzan, a Mars-crossing asteroid, named after the Japanese mountain * Kumazawa Banzan (1619–1691), a Confucian scholar in the Edo period * Mount Banzan, Japan, where the Sendai Astronomical Observatory is located
title: Banzan
